summary: The bill, titled the "Heroes Earned Affordable Lifts Act" (HEAL Act), amends Title 38 of the United States Code to improve transportation benefits for veterans. It increases mileage reimbursement rates for veterans traveling to and from Department of Veterans Affairs facilities, aligning them with the General Services Administration's rates. It also prohibits deductibles for veteran travel expenses. Furthermore, it expands the entities eligible to receive transportation payments, including veterans service organizations and local government agencies providing veteran transportation.
